import React, { Component } from 'react'; import './sdg17.css'; import '../../node_modules/bootstrap/dist/css/bootstrap.css'; class Sdg17 extends Component { render() { return (

Goal-17 Partnership for the Goals

To assist developing countries in attaining long-term debt sustainability through coordinated policies aimed at fostering debt financing, debt relief and debt restructuring by 2030.

Mobilizing financial resources for developing countries and mobilize resources to improve the domestic revenue collection through international support to enhance domestic capacity for taxes and revenue.

Investing in the least developed countries.

Enhancing North-South, South-South and triangular regional and international cooperation on and access to science, technology and innovation.

Enhancing North-South, South-South and triangular regional and international cooperation on and access to science, technology and innovation.

Strengthening science, technology and innovation capacity for least developed countries.

Promote universal trading system under the World Trade Organization(WTO).

Increasing exports from developing countries.

Removing trade barriers for least developed countries.

Enhancing global macroeconomic stability.

To enhance policy coherence for sustainable development.

Encourage effective partnerships in the societies .

Enhance availability of high quality, timely and reliable data to everyone irrespective of age, gender , race, ethnicity, location etc.

 ); } } export default Sdg17;
